newsitem.title: UK: GOLF-ENGLISH OPEN FIRST ROUND SCORES.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-ENGLISH OPEN FIRST ROUND SCORES.

text.p: Leading first round scores in the English Open golf tournament on Thursday (Britain unless stated):
66 Roger Champman
67 Thomas Goegele (Germany)
68 Carl Suneson (Spain), Paul Lawrie, Gary Emerson, Dennis
Edlund, Miguel Angel Jimenez (Spain), Mats Hallberg
(Sweden), Brian Davis, Stephen Ames (Trinidad), Steve
Webster
69 Steven Bottomley, Robert Lee, Jose Maria Olazabal (Spain),
John Mellor, Russell Claydon, Wayne Riley (Australia)
70 David Howell, Ross Drummond, Daniel Chopra (Sweden),
Jim Payne, Barry Lane, Mark McNulty (Zimbabwe),
Per-Ulrik Johansson (Sweden), Ronan Rafferty, Jamie
Spence, Carl Mason, Per Haugsrud (Norway), Anders
Forsbrand, Mathias Gronberg (Sweden), Niclas Fasth
(Sweden), Mats Lanner (Sweden), Olle Karlsson (Sweden)
71 Joakim Rask (Sweden), Marc Farry (France), Peter Baker,
Raymond Russell, David Higgins (Ireland), Carl Watts,
Philip Walton (Ireland), Thomas Bjorn (Denmark), Wayne
Westner (South Africa), Kaysuyoshi Tomori (Japan),
Paolo Quirici (Switzerland), Stuart Cage, Howard Clark,
Peter Lonard (Australia), Paul Curry, Gary Clark,
Stephen, McAllister, Christy O'Connor (Ireland), Robert
Karlsson (Sweden), Adam Hunter, Gary Orr, Pedro Linhart
(Spain)
